mapper.select: select `quarter`.*, t1.te_type as team1, t2.te_type as team2 from `quarter` join team as t1 on qu_te_num1 = t1.te_num join team as t2 on qu_te_num2 = t2.te_num where qu_mt_num = #{mt_num} order by qu_num asc
mapper.insert: insert into `quarter`(qu_mt_num, qu_te_num1, qu_goal1, qu_te_num2, qu_goal2) values (#{quarter.qu_mt_num}, #{quarter.qu_te_num1}, #{quarter.qu_goal1}, #{quarter.qu_te_num2}, #{quarter.qu_goal2})
mapper.update: update `quarter` set qu_te_num1 = #{quarter.qu_te_num1}, qu_te_num2 = #{quarter.qu_te_num2}, qu_goal1 = #{quarter.qu_goal1}, qu_goal2 = #{quarter.qu_goal2} where qu_num = #{quarter.qu_num}
